database.name: VIEW RV_ASSET_CUSTOMER
database.view: SELECT A_Asset_ID, AD_Client_ID, AD_Org_ID, IsActive, Created, CreatedBy, Updated, UpdatedBy, VALUE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, HELP, A_ASSET_GROUP_ID, M_PRODUCT_ID, SERNO, LOT, VERSIONNO, GUARANTEEDATE, ASSETSERVICEDATE, C_BPARTNER_ID, C_BPARTNER_LOCATION_ID, AD_USER_ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM A_Asset_Delivery ad WHERE a.A_Asset_ID=ad.A_Asset_ID) AS DeliveryCount FROM A_Asset a WHERE C_BPartner_ID IS NOT NULL
